articles.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
articles.description: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel? And how does it make others feel
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Alphabet is increasingly launching “moonshot” projects as independent companies — here’s why
articles.description: Despite the emphasis on detachment from ideas, X employees do have significant skin in the game when projects spin out.
articles.author: Connie Loizos
